input.sentences: we set the table for the family dinner in advance | to ease the load .
over time each member of the family started to arrive | and we greeted them with open arms .
we headed to the market to pick up some meats | with the vendors sausage looking wonderful .
once all the family got settled in | they all eagerly awaited the arrival of the food .
lo and behold | the guest of honor | the chef | finally began bring out delicious meals for everyone .
output.sentences: The table was set up for the lunch.
They greeted the people and started the lunch on time.
The vendors had a wonderful sausage.
The family was settled in the food court.
They honoured and served the meal.
